about_the_game:
Features

  • Play a 3D third person adventure game that tells a story of self-discovery with fantastical, supernatural, and psychological themes

  • Walk in a small but meticulously crafted open world with people and events that run according to clockwork for one in-game & real-world hour

  • Converse with and engage in unique interactions with other lost souls

  • Explore a liminal atmosphere that is not explicitly terrifying, but subtly creepy and uncanny

  • Your actions during the hour will determine your ending

Play as a young man at a crossroads in life

A demon approaches the protagonist, Kai, during a night walk, who gives him one hour to decide whether or not to give the demon his most precious memory in exchange for freedom from worldly pain. During this little time you are given, will you choose to keep Kai's memories and deal with the pain of waking life? Is it better to sacrifice what is precious to him and escape reality? Or will he continue to wander the streets, searching for answers in the dark where strange beings await him?

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains depictions of mental health issues such as depression and psychosis, and non-explicit scenes of death and suicide that may not be suitable for all audiences.

name: A Passing in the Night
short_description: Immerse yourself in a third-person adventure game in which you take a timed, one hour-long night walk. Explore a reactive and surreal neighborhood where reality bends and spirits lurk in the shadows. Converse with other lost wanderers and reclaim hope in a bleak world.

English*, Japanese, Korean
